item.title: SML members @bae_inhwan @isabellemcdaph @haesooheatherk and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students @btf_bluetree about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, @ParkChanJun_ , thank you for inviting us! #bluetreefoundation
item.description: SML members <a href="https://x.com/bae_inhwan" target="_blank">@bae_inhwan</a> <a href="https://x.com/isabellemcdaph" target="_blank">@isabellemcdaph</a> <a href="https://x.com/haesooheatherk" target="_blank">@haesooheatherk</a> and Julia Sebastien had a lovely meeting with the students <a href="https://x.com/btf_bluetree" target="_blank">@btf_bluetree</a> about youth social media safety! It was great to chat, <a href="https://x.com/ParkChanJun_" target="_blank">@ParkChanJun_</a> , thank you for inviting us! <a href="https://x.com/hashtag/bluetreefoundation?src=hashtag_click" target="_blank">#bluetreefoundation</a>

item.title: We are excited to welcome Han Li, @HanLi_1231 to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-objeâ€¦Â  She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (@renwenzhang). item.description: We are excited to welcome Han Li, <a href="https://x.com/HanLi_1231" target="_blank">@HanLi_1231</a> to SML! Han joined our collaborative project on "Deterring Objectionable Behaviors Online," <a href="https://socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-objectionable-behavior-online" target="_blank">socialsciences.cornell.edu/deterring-objeâ€¦</a>Â She comes to us after her postdoc at the NUS where she worked with Dr. Renwen Zhang (<a href="https://x.com/renwenzhang" target="_blank">@renwenzhang</a>). Welcome, Han! <a href="https://x.com/CUSocialMedia/status/1894397692035416123/photo/1" target="_blank">pic.x.com/SRhPmI1Nu4</a><br><img src="https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkKwiMeWwAAk1Us.jpg"/>
